com.fluidops.iwb.mapping
Class Data

java.lang.Object
  com.fluidops.iwb.mapping.Data
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
GraphData, PojoData, RdfData, StringData, TableData, TreeData
public abstract class Data
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

base class for all mapping data models such as tree, table, graph, pojos, etc. An instance of this class represents one step in a mapping pipeline Class also contains methods that create the initial Data instance, e.g. by loading it from a URL

Author:
aeb
See Also:
